hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: buildNumber
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: the build number for which we want to generate report

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CIRunStartDateTime
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Date when this CI run Started.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CIRunEndDateTime
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Date when this CI run Ended.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GitRepoUrl
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Repo URL which was used for this CI run

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GitCommitId
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The Last CommitId used for this CI Run

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: WikiLinks
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provides the relevant information required for the user to understand the CI.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: HyperVisorInfo
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provides Simulator Info, where this build was run.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BuildNo
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provides Build Information for this branch.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BranchInfo
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provides Branch Information for this git repo

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BuildReport
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provides Detail Report for the Run

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set -x SUITE_PATH="${BASEDIR}/${hypervisor}" mkdir -p $WORKSPACE/${hypervisor}/reports/ rm -rf $WORKSPACE/${hypervisor}/reports/*
for file in `find $SUITE_PATH -name test_*.xml` do cp -f $file $WORKSPACE/${hypervisor}/reports/ suite=`echo $file | sed -e 's/.*reports\///' -e 's/\.xml//g'` rm -rf $WORKSPACE/${hypervisor}/reports/$suite rm -rf $WORKSPACE/${hypervisor}/reports/$suite.zip suite_path=`echo $file | sed -e 's/reports.*//'`
chmod -R a+x $suite_path/
log_folder=`ls -ltr $suite_path/results/MarvinLogs | tail -1 | awk '{print $9}'` mkdir -p $WORKSPACE/${hypervisor}/reports/$suite cp -f $suite_path/results/MarvinLogs/$log_folder/*.* $WORKSPACE/${hypervisor}/reports/$suite find $WORKSPACE/${hypervisor}/reports/$suite -iname *.txt -exec zip -j /$WORKSPACE/${hypervisor}/reports/${suite}.zip {} \;
done
NFS_SVR="nfs1.lab.vmops.com" PREFIX=${hypervisor}__ NFS_PATH="/var/www/html/automation/" HYP=${hypervisor}
#create dir on NFS with CS version and hypervisor ssh -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@$NFS_SVR mkdir -p $NFS_PATH/$version/$HYP
#collect test_run logs for each suite mkdir -p $WORKSPACE/tmp rm -rf /tmp/test_run.* find $WORKSPACE -iname *.zip -exec zip -j $WORKSPACE/tmp/test_run.zip {} \; scp $WORKSPACE/tmp/test_run.zip root@${NFS_SVR}:$NFS_PATH/$version/$HYP
#zip $suite.xml into test_results.zip rm -rf /tmp/test_results.* find $WORKSPACE -iname *.xml -exec zip -j $WORKSPACE/tmp/test_results.zip {} \; scp $WORKSPACE/tmp/test_results.zip root@${NFS_SVR}:$NFS_PATH/$version/$HYP
#use cloud-bugtool to collect mysqldump, management server logs etc., ssh -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@$MGMT_SVR mkdir -p /tmp/management_${buildNumber}/management ssh -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@$MGMT_SVR cp /automation/cloudstack/vmops.log /tmp/management_${buildNumber}/management/ ssh -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@$MGMT_SVR "pushd /tmp/management_${buildNumber}; zip ${PREFIX}Log_$buildNumber -r management; popd;" scp -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@$MGMT_SVR:/tmp/management_${buildNumber}/${PREFIX}Log_$buildNumber.zip $WORKSPACE/tmp/ scp -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no $WORKSPACE/tmp/${PREFIX}Log_$buildNumber.zip root@${NFS_SVR}:$NFS_PATH/$version/$HYP ssh -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@$MGMT_SVR rm -rf /tmp/management_${buildNumber}
ssh -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@$NFS_SVR zip -rj $NFS_PATH/$version/$HYP/${PREFIX}Log_$buildNumber.zip $NFS_PATH/$version/$HYP/test_run.zip ssh -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@$NFS_SVR rm -rf $NFS_PATH/$version/$HYP/test_run.zip ssh -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@$NFS_SVR zip -rj $NFS_PATH/$version/$HYP/${PREFIX}Log_$buildNumber.zip $NFS_PATH/$version/$HYP/test_results.zip ssh root@$NFS_SVR rm -rf $NFS_PATH/$version/$HYP/test_results.zip

hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultSubject: CI BVT Run: ${ENV, var="hypervisor"}: Build_Number: ${ENV, var="buildNumber"}
